name: The Repopulation: A Sandbox MMORPG
blurb: A Sci-Fi based MMORPG which provides many of the same sandbox oriented features seen in Star Wars Galaxies and Ultima Online.

rewards.reward: Recruit\r\n============================== \r\nThanks Recruit. You will be given 1 Repop Token to choose from special cosmetic options available only to early adopters. You will be given a special forum backer rank and be able to reserve a name to use in game.

***UPGRADE ONLY!***\r\n\r\nThis is a Package Upgrade for previous backers. Please only select this if you are looking to do an upgrade or "bump-up". This is not for new supporters. Please see the instructions in the Package Upgrades section on how to change the pledge amount to do more than a $15 bump or how to do less than $15 if needed.
Private\r\n============================== \r\nAs a Private you will receive the previous rewards along with $10 in Store Credit, a Silver Membership, and Closed Beta Round 3 Access (CB3).

Corporal\r\n==============================\r\nThanks Corporal, along with the previous rewards you will be given $20 more Store Credits for a total of $30, Closed Beta Round 2 Access (CB2), a Gold Membership, 1 day head start, and 1 more Repop Token bringing the total to 2.

Sergeant\r\n==============================\r\nThanks Sergeant, along with the previous rewards you will be given a Platinum Membership, 1 more day of head start for a total of 2, 1 more Repop Token for a total of 3, and $5 additional Store Credit for a total of $35.

Sergeant Major\r\n==============================\r\nThanks Sergeant Major, along with the previous rewards you will be given 1 more day head start bringing your total to 3, $25 more Store Credits for a total of $60, Closed Beta Round 1 Access (CB1), and the Founder Titile.

Warrant Officer\r\n==============================\r\nThanks Warrant Officer, along with the previous rewards you will be given the Founder or Voyage Plaque, an additional day of head start bringing the total to 4, an additional 2 Repop Tokens bringing the total to 5, and Closed Beta Round 1 Plus Access (CB1+)

Lieutenant\r\n==============================\r\nThanks Lieutenant, along with the previous rewards you will be able to Customize a NPC, have a name inserted into Lore, Closed Alpha Round 3 Access (CA3) (March 2014), and an additional 2 Repop Tokens bringing the total to 7.

Captain\r\n==============================\r\nThanks Captain, along with the previous rewards you will be granted a Small Housing plot located in the OWON or FPR controlled area on the Normal ruleset server.

Major\r\n==============================\r\nThanks Major, along with the previous rewards you will be able to add a custom logo for armor or clothes along with a recipe to use to share it, customize your previous NPC with a Personality, and your plot will be upgraded to medium in size.

Colonel\r\n==============================\r\nThanks Colonel, along with the previous awards you will be able to specify a custom weapon model and receive a recipe to share it. You will also be given 1 more day of head start for a total of 5 days and can share that head start with 5 other accounts.

General\r\n==============================\r\nThanks General, along with the previous awards you will be able to design your own statue monument and receive a recipe to share it. You will also be able to assign your NPC to become a more notable NPC in the game.

Senator\r\n==============================\r\nThanks Senator, along with the previous awards your Housing Plot will be upgraded to large in size. You will be granted an additional notable NPC bringing your total to 2.

World Leader\r\n==============================\r\nWe have a World Leader (or 2). Along with the previous awards you come and meet us at a conference we are attending in 2014 or 2015, design a unique mission template with the team, and you will receive an additional day of head start for you and 5 other accounts bringing the total to 6 days.
